description.translate: Imbued with an endless hope, she shines with an incredible will and grace.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Princesse de lumière\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Imbue d'un espoir sans fin, elle rayonne\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'une volonté et d'une grâce inouïes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Imbued with an endless hope, she shines\"}","{\"text\":\"§7with an incredible will and grace.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
